channel.title: Artificial Intelligence on Shuhei A. Horiguchi
channel.description: Recent content in Artificial Intelligence on Shuhei A. Horiguchi

item.title: AIR for Human
item.description:
Artificial Intelligence Research for Human (人工知能研究会 / AIR) is a community for artificial intelligence research led by students and young researchers.

We received the Open Innovation Award from the Minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology. 第４回 日本オープンイノベーション大賞 内閣総理大臣賞等 受賞者の決定について（科学技術・イノベーション推進事務局 プレスリリース）
